data.text: @tzemingdynasty Assume he is properly vaccinated, so “it doesn’t feel like much more than a cold [after receiving state of the art mRNA vaccine]”. Possibly also lower initial infectious dose. First = scientific marvel, Second = luck given performative mask non-wearing. Neither = personal virtue.
@tzemingdynasty Awww, he's like our own lil' Trumpy, looking up at the eclipse with no eye-mask.
@tzemingdynasty Nothing to see here, just parroting Steve Bannon talking points after covertly dealing with extremists who want to hang the PM A++ very normal
@HonestUniverse @tzemingdynasty Appealing to hopelessly outdated tropes is National's schtick.
@tzemingdynasty Such a dog whistle to the “it’s just a cold” crew.
